So you wanna farm

Greater Shadow Protection Potions ?

Find herbs , hate kingsblood .

You'll need to make Shadow Oil .

Check out the table below to see how. To get this stuff you'll need to farm herbs in Scarlet Monastery

Shadow Oil

=

Fadeleaf x 4

Grave Moss x 4

Leaded Vial x 1

Once you've created shadow oil, you can make Greater Shadow Protection Potions

Greater Shadow Protection Potion

=

Shadow Oil x 1

Dreamfoil x 4

Crystal Vial x 1

Farming Scarlet Monastery

Run through SM in this order:
->





Resetting the instance

Reset after doing armory by right clicking your portrait.

HerbCalc

There are three herb nodes in Graveyard. They can be either the chad grave moss or the virgin kingsblood.
First, click on how many grave moss spawned, then how many you looted:
